name: Akvo-docs
tagline: The core repository for documentation we will store at http://docs.akvo.org (or equivalent)
body:
# Docs.akvo.org
A library of links to particular Akvo documentation.

## Internal IT

### Userguides: [Dropbox](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/uma8bfk0wd3rrsh/AAApV55D0tXYZfAVp9uN4PMQa?dl=0) | [Email client setup](https://www.dropbox.com/sh/tgj0ls3i317whke/AACYyie6mhyGzSsmNf-oOqpva?dl=0) |  

## Legal information

### Policies:  [Cookies](http://akvo.org/help/akvo-policies-and-terms-2/akvo-terms-of-use/cookie-policy/) | [Anti-corruption & sanctions](http://akvo.org/help/akvo-policies-and-terms-2/anti-corruption-and-sanction-policy/) | [Non-discrimination](http://akvo.org/help/akvo-policies-and-terms-2/akvo-non-discrimination-policy/) | [Privacy](http://akvo.org/help/akvo-policies-and-terms-2/akvo-privacy-policy/) | [Licensing & copyrighting](http://akvo.org/help/akvo-policies-and-terms-2/akvo-licensing-and-copyrights/) | 

### Terms & conditions:  [Akvo.org terms of use](http://akvo.org/help/akvo-policies-and-terms-2/akvo-terms-of-use/) | [Donations](http://akvo.org/help/akvo-donation-policy/) | [General terms & conditions](http://akvo.org/help/akvo-policies-and-terms-2/akvo-general-terms-and-conditions/) | [Akvo FLOW](http://akvo.org/help/akvo-policies-and-terms-2/akvo-general-terms-and-conditions/exhibit-a-akvo-flow-services-and-support-terms-and-conditions/) | [Akvo RSR](http://akvo.org/help/akvo-policies-and-terms-2/akvo-general-terms-and-conditions/exhibit-b-akvo-rsr-services-and-support-terms-and-conditions/) | [Akvopedia](http://akvo.org/help/akvo-policies-and-terms-2/akvo-general-terms-and-conditions/exhibit-c-akvopedia-services-and-support-terms-and-conditions/)
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
